Articles.Content:
Hi,

37c3 is happenign at the end of December.

https://events.ccc.de/2023/10/06/37c3-teaser/

Who here wants to join me there?

Is there any demand for an KSP aerea with Demo PC and seating like last time?

There will be a lot of space nerds (like Ham radio, rocket builders and general computer nerds present)

Greetings

VITAS

 

P.S. im always happy for any merch to give away on events like these.

Seems like noone wants to come. I will setup one or two computers with ksp and dmp at the event anyways.

Makes me a bit sad it isnt what it used to be a few years ago.
